body.name: JacobsParts® Windshield Mount for Garmin Nuvi 1450 1490
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 29 mins.
body.description: Never lose your way! Keep your Nuvi GPS with you at all time with this windshield suction mount. Just stick the mount to your windshield with the suction cup and lock it in place. The mounting bracket connects to a ball joint which allows you to position your GPS at the most comfortable angle for you, while keeping it steady, level, and easy to read even over bumpy terrain.Extra GPS mounts are the perfect solution for moving your navigation system from one vehicle to another with the least amount of hassle.Mounting bracket included.Package Includes:1x GPS Windshield Mount1x Mounting Bracket

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 474 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great holds the GPS tighter than I like had to modify which was easy to do
reviews.reviewText: Much better than I expected from the reviews. The GPS does fit very tight in this so I took a Dremel to the upper clip so I can remove the GPS with one hand (ground it down till it was easy to remove). The suction cup works way better than the one that came with the Garmin (that one was getting old though). I've had it on the wind shield for several weeks and it hasn't budged.I bought 2 due to the bad reviews, but I'm glad I did as I can use the second one for travel and leave the other in the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality product at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: After several years, the bracket for my Garmin Nuvi 1490 was broken.The replacement bracket fits very well to the original Garmin mount holder. Excellent replacement part. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WAS working perfectly fine... till you try to move it for the first time!
reviews.reviewText: This came in quickly, no hassles with the sale at all. Seemed to work acceptably after I put it up. Had a few issues with it falling of the windsheild but I assumed I needed to remove it a clean the windshield and suction cup... until I went to relocate it. Basically I got it where I wanted it, made sure my GPS was functioning and was properly located, then today I went to permanently install it (i.e. hardwire the cable for the GPS) and found that the suction cup was ripped. Guess that explains why it was falling occasionally! Now it's completely useless... Shoulda saved my money and bought direct from Garmin I guess!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect replacement for original.
reviews.reviewText: This was meant to replace the original mount, lost in a transfer of vehicles. The mount fits the GPS unit perfectly, and does everything the original mount did. My husband is very pleased, and I'm the "wizard" who found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I was worried that the replacement would not be the same as the Garmin original. Well my fears were dispelled and the mount came with everything I needed and quickly. The first time I used it I thought it was not going to work because it did not stick and fell to the floor. However, I picked it up and tried it again and it stuck and has been sticking ever since. It does dry out, just as the original did and falls off the windshield on hot days, but that is not a concern for me since I take the GPS off of it when I park it for the day or in a parking lot unattended. I do not want to advertise my GPS for everyone to see or take. I got two of them just in case I leave it again and will not have to be without. Awesome buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you are purchasing this (and it is recommended), ...
reviews.reviewText: If you are purchasing this (and it is recommended), you should know it does not come with the adhesive discs. The adhesive discs, which cost about another $15.00, are what allow you to mount your GPS to the dashboard instead of the windshield.If you try to install the GPS directly on the windshield, you will find, as other reviewers already have, that it does not stick too well. At least not in the hot Florida sun. Cheers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That was a gift
reviews.reviewText: Person I gave it to said they liked it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I used the GPS mount about 10 times and the lever broke. Never had this happen before. I have used this type for several years before I had any problem. I will have to have a new one to get the suction to stick on the windshield.
as good or better than the original that came with my Garmin GPS. Solid, good quality suction cup.
